description:
Life cut short by illness at just 39 years old, Machio Hiraku knows not to take simple blessings for granted. When a godlike figure gives him given a chance to live again, Hiraku has only the simplest of wishes for his new life: to be healthy, to live peacefully, to speak the local language, and to spend his days on an idyllic farm. Fresh air, sunshine, honest work, and good company combine to form the happy, peaceful existence Hiraku has always dreamed of.

(Source: HIDIVE)
synonyms: ISEKAI FARMING - Vita contadina in un altro mondo

tags.name: Agriculture
tags.description: Prominently features agriculture practices.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Found Family
tags.description: Features a group of characters with no biological relations that are united in a group providing social support.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Monster Girl
tags.description: Prominently features a female character who is part-monster.

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

tags.name: Kingdom Management
tags.description: Characters in these series take on the responsibility of running a town or kingdom, whether they take control of an existing one, or build their own from the ground up.

tags.name: Maids
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a maid.

tags.name: Elf
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is an elf.

tags.name: Vampire
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a vampire.

tags.name: Angels
tags.description: Prominently features spiritual beings usually represented with wings and halos and believed to be attendants of God.

tags.name: Horticulture
tags.description: The story prominently features plant care and gardening.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: Demons
tags.description: Prominently features malevolent otherworldly creatures.

tags.name: Kemonomimi
tags.description: Prominently features humanoid characters with animal ears.

tags.name: Polyamorous
tags.description: Features a character who is in a consenting relationship with multiple people at one time.

tags.name: Chibi
tags.description: Features "super deformed" character designs with smaller, rounder proportions and a cute look.

tags.name: Pregnancy
tags.description: Features pregnant female characters or discusses the topic of pregnancy.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Food
tags.description: Centers around cooking or food appraisal.

tags.name: Parenthood
tags.description: Centers around the experience of raising a child.

tags.name: Gods
tags.description: Prominently features a character of divine or religious nature.

tags.name: Mahjong
tags.description: Centered around the game of mahjong.

tags.name: Shogi
tags.description: Centers around the game of shogi.

tags.name: Monster Boy
tags.description: Prominently features a male character who is a part-monster.

tags.name: Cohabitation
tags.description: Features two or more people who live in the same household and develop a romantic or sexual relationship.

tags.name: Creature Taming
tags.description: Features the taming of animals, monsters, or other creatures.

__Machida Touko__ is a Japanese script/screenwriter and series composer.

An animator, animation director and character designer.

_Note: Not to be confused with an older animator [Yoshiko Saitou](https://anilist.co/staff/200837/)._

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/YochikoSAITO) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/21513611)

An animator, animation director and character designer.

_Note: Not to be confused with an older animator [Yoshiko Saitou](https://anilist.co/staff/200837/)._

He is an art director and supervisor, who was a long time member of Bihou until 2007 when he went to head the background art department in Totonyan. He belongs to the anime production group Neko-Nanban-Tei together with director Watanabe Takashi and his wife Miyata Naomi.
__Shuuhei Abe__ is a Japanese sound director and sound production manager.

__Non-anime roles:__
- Product 12 - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Product 23 - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Chevreuse - Genshin Impact (VG)

**Non-anime roles:**

- Sayu - Genshin Impact (VG)

- Jefuty - Reverse Collapse: Code Name Bakery (VG)

__Age:__ 22
__Generation:__ First Generation

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/yui_hizuki) | [Twitter (Sub Account)](https://twitter.com/yui_penpe) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCuk7vapXKckSw6yCGGDspDg)

Hizuki Yui (緋月ゆい) is a female Japanese Virtual YouTuber affiliated with Neo-Porte. She is part of the first generation of Neo-Porte members along with Aruse Inu, NaYuta, Yozuna Niu, Tentei Forte, and Minase.
**Mitsunori Yamaguchi** is a Japanese animator, animation supervisor and animation director.
**Mitsunori Yamaguchi** is a Japanese animator, animation supervisor and animation director.
